name: Raf R's Operation Application art Machines - FULL DOWNLOAD.
name_original: Raf R's Operation Application art Machines - FULL DOWNLOAD.
description:
Change variables with your sliders to create pretty moving pieces. hold down space and drag sliders with your mouse to change your equation as it draws itself. let go of space to pause and save, change timescale to reverse or speed up and find pretty moments in your ever changing piece. press z to get a seed, copy it, press x to load, paste it, and see your favorite pieces load right back up to reanimate and toggle in real time. each individual "Machine" .html file is different. part 1 gives more lines and vertices. part 2 is simpler but more pulsing and flowing. the fractal generator is so complex your pieces will bloom one at a time, trading the dancing animation for complex, colorful shapes. give each time and try new slider positions and you are sure to find a mesmerizing seed.

play the machines from this download, in browser on these pages:

1-https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/raf-rs-operation-application-art-machine

2-https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/raf-rs-operation-application-art-machine-2

3-https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/raf-rs-operation-application-art-machine-fractal-gen...
